general.shop_uuid_field: Unique identifier of your store in the payment system.
general.shop_secret1_field: Used to sign requests and ensure security.
general.shop_secret2_field: Second secret key for additional authentication.
general.pay_desc_filed: Template used to generate the payment description (visible to the client in payment details).
general.pay_desc_placeholders:
VariableDescription
{username}Username (nickname) from NamelessMC profile
{email}User's email address
{ip}Client's IP address from which the order was placed
{date}Date and time the order was created in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
{order_id}Internal order ID in the database
{products}List of all product names in the order, comma-separated
{amount}Order amount in format 1234.56
{currency}Order currency (e.g.: RUB, USD, UAH)
